title: SBI Large Cap Fund (formerly SBI Bluechip Fund)
text: SBI Large Cap Fund expense ratio approx 0.81% Direct and 1.48%–1.50% Regular. Exit load 0.25% within 30 days; 0.10% between 30–90 days. Riskometer Very High.

title: SBI Flexicap Fund
text: Minimum SIP ₹500. Benchmark BSE 500 TRI. Expense ratio listed on latest factsheet.

title: SBI ELSS Tax Saver Fund
text: ELSS lock-in 3 years. Minimum investment details in KIM/SID. Expense ratio published in scheme factsheet.
